properties.description: Explorar un archivo CSV que contiene '\' como separador en las columnas

content.query:
use electric_vehicle_explorer;

SELECT * 
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'location.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'electric_vehicle_data_bronze',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ';',
        FIELDQUOTE = '\'
    ) as location;
